title: BATTERY SYSTEM TERMINALS AND OUTGOING BUSBARS
fullText:
If outgoing busbars are connected to the battery system or battery modules terminals, the outgoing busbars shall â€”
(a) be insulated from the battery system or battery module terminals to a height of 2.5 m or the battery system room ceiling height, whichever is the lower; and
(b) be clearly identified and segregated from other supply circuits.
The battery system terminals and busbar connections shall have their polarity clearly identified and be shrouded or be protected by insulating barriers, having an IP rating of at least IP2X.
